verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
So you think that you have plenty of time
The road ahead seems long and it seems wide

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
But should the road you follow
And suddenly tomorrow
Would Jesus came to you"Will done my child"

verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
For you've got one life to live let it be for Jesus
You've got one life to live let it be for Him

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
You'll find that in your giving
Your life will be worth living
You've got one life to live
Let it be for Him

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
You feel the day with the things that thrill you
But soon you find that they don't fulfill you

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
You feel His Spirits drawing
There is a higher calling
So give your all to Him
His pleading will you?

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
One life to live let it be for Jesus
One life to live let it be for Him
You'll find that in your giving
Your life will be worth living

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
You've got one life to live let it be for Him
Let it be for Jesus
Let it be for God
One life to live for God
